about_the_game:
Black Inc.: Go to Work is a pixel-style RPG game created using RPG MV, the game has 2 characters and 8 endings, the game is inspired by China's overtime culture, players accumulate energy and work hard to achieve the ultimate game goal. There are also many NPC characters in the game, and players can buy items from NPCs to maintain their energy, and they can also spend time with NPCs during off-duty hours.

【Synopsis】

There is still a month left before the Spring Festival, but your leader asked you to complete all the work within 30 days, otherwise you will not be allowed to take a holiday!

At this point, your body is no longer able to support your excessive overtime. But at the same time, you want to go home for the holidays...... Thinking about the expectations of your family and the encouragement of your lover, you grit your teeth and persevere......

*There are markets and parks in the game, and you can go and buy the items you need during your off-duty hours, provided you have enough money.

* Exhausting all your energy will cause irreversible results, so please stay energetic.

* You only have seven days off, should you go home, or go to find your lover? Whoever you look for, it's best to bring some gifts back, which will affect the ending.

* Get your work done as soon as possible or there will be a penalty!
